title: This Anker 100W charging station is perfect for the new iPhone 16
content:
Macworld

If you’re already planning on ordering your iPhone 16, then we have the perfect charging station for it. This Anker 100W charging station is $40 for Amazon Prime members, down from its MSRP of $60 and the lowest price we’ve ever seen.

This is a 9-in-1 charging station that features four USB-C ports, two USB-A ports, and three AC outlets. That’s such a versatile gadget to have, charging multiple devices at the same time – including your brand-new iPhone 16.

The charging station delivers a robust 100W output, which is enough for even the most demanding devices, such as your MacBook. Despite offering so many outlets, this is a rather compact gadget with a 3.15×3.15-inch base and just 4 inches tall. The plug is about as thin as your Apple Watch, fitting in nicely in that outlet behind your desk.

While you’re waiting for the iPhone 16 delivery, you should definitely add this Anker charging station to your cart for $40 at Amazon. If you haven’t subscribed to Amazon Prime yet, now’s the time to do it, especially as you get to enjoy a 30-day free trial.

This Anker charging station is perfect for your new iPhone
Buy this now at Amazon
